body_html:
I didn't know about rake rails:update. I'll go though it and get all the goodies in there.

secrets.yml is a good abstraction of ENV variables as it keeps them all in one place. It's a good idea to have imo.
body_text:
I didn't know about rake rails:update. I'll go though it and get all the goodies in there.
secrets.yml is a good abstraction of ENV variables as it keeps them all in one place. It's a good idea to have imo.
body:
I didn't know about rake `rails:update`. I'll go though it and get all the goodies in there.

`secrets.yml` is a good abstraction of `ENV` variables as it keeps them all in one place. It's a good idea to have imo.
